jobDescription: Data Analysis * Tableau * Data Warehouse * R * Python * Google Analytics * My client, a Woodland Hills based insurance company is looking for Data Analyst to join their marketing team. Ideal candidate should Data Warehouse and Google Analytics experience. The tasks for this role include creating reports on the data in data warehouse, utilizling Tableau to create data on dashboards, and analyzing data that was generated from the internal database. If you are looking to take the next step in your career and want to be a Data Scientist, this role is perfect for you as it will help you get there.  If you are interested in this opportunity, please call Lead Recruiter Jimmy Escobar at (310) 209-6838 or Jimmy.Escobar@RHT.com
